name: Vegan Broccoli Cheese Soup
description: This Vegan Broccoli Cheese Soup is loaded with cheesy goodness and totally dairy free! It's so thick and creamy and ready in just 30 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable broth or olive oil, for sauteing
1  medium russet potato, peeled and cubed

recipeInstructions.text: In a large soup pot, saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil for 2-3 minutes over medium heat, stirring frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large soup pot, saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil for 2-3 minutes over medium heat, stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: To the pot, add the potato, carrots, cashews, vegetable broth, nutritional yeast, smoked paprika and salt. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, until fork tender.
recipeInstructions.name: To the pot, add the potato, carrots, cashews, vegetable broth, nutritional yeast, smoked paprika and salt. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, until fork tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Working in batches if needed, transfer the soup carefully to a blender and blend until very smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Working in batches if needed, transfer the soup carefully to a blender and blend until very smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Return the mixture back to the pot. If your soup is too thick, add water until a desired consistency is reached (I used 1 cup of water). Add in the bite sized broccoli florets and stir into the soup.
recipeInstructions.name: Return the mixture back to the pot. If your soup is too thick, add water until a desired consistency is reached (I used 1 cup of water). Add in the bite sized broccoli florets and stir into the soup.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the heat to simmer for 10 minutes, until the broccoli is soft and cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the heat to simmer for 10 minutes, until the broccoli is soft and cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve, topping with non-dairy cheddar cheese shreds, if desired. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve, topping with non-dairy cheddar cheese shreds, if desired. Enjoy!
